explains: n. 艺术性；工艺；艺术技巧；艺术效果；艺术工作

sentences.en: He played the piece with effortless artistry.
sentences.cn: 他游刃有余地演奏了这首乐曲。

sentences.en: But there is a lot of artistry in the best of the West.
sentences.cn: 但是别忘了在西方文化里还有许多璀璨的艺术。

sentences.en: We're trying to inject art and artistry into this at every turn.
sentences.cn: 我们会试图在每个环节注入艺术性。
